titleStmt.title: Two speeches spoken in Parliament, by Sir Edward Hales, and Sir William Wroth: on the twentieth day of Januarie, 1641. Concerning a letter sent from his Majestie to the House of Commons, and read in the same that day.
titleStmt.author: Hales, Edward, Sir, 1575 or 6-1654.
Wroth, William, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1641; Thomason catalogue lists under 1642.
Each speech has its own Thomason number.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
